titles.title: Defense Production Act Extension and Reauthorization of 2008
Defense Production Act Extension and Reauthorization of 2008
Defense Production Act Extension and Reauthorization of 2008
Defense Production Act Extension and Reauthorization of 2008
To extend and reauthorize the Defense Production Act of 1950, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Mr. Gutierrez moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6894.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 10/8/2008--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Defense Production Act Extension and Reauthorization of 2008 - Extends and reauthorizes the Defense Production Act of 1950 through FY2009.
